titles.title: Encouraging increased public awareness of eating disorders and expanded research for treatment and cures.
Encouraging increased public awareness of eating disorders and expanded research for treatment and cures.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Calls for: (1) increasing public awareness of eating disorders; (2) expanding research for treatment and cures; (3) broadening access to treatment; and (4) promoting healthful eating habits and a healthy body image.
